channel.title: PatientFirstDentistry on SeaHealth
channel.description: Recent content in PatientFirstDentistry on SeaHealth

item.title: The Cost Benefits for Dental Clinics of Voice AI Over Traditional Call Centers
item.description:
The process of efficiently handling telephone calls remains a major challenge when dental practices work to improve the way they interact with patients. Today’s patients want calls replied to immediately together with simple appointment booking systems and understandable service information. Traditionally dental clinics have made use of their internal receptionists together with external call centers to manage patient inquiries.

These operational solutions carry expensive costs which result in reduced operational effectiveness. SeaHealth Voice AI technology provides affordable automated services that decrease operational phone calls and generate faster patient support responses and lower operational labor costs.

item.title: How SeaChat Voice AI Offers 24/7 Dental Support for Inbound Calls
item.description: Currently, we are growing in population rapidly, with a projected population increase of approximately 2 billion people in the upcoming 30 years. This massive increase comes with an influx of patients. The growing population is more prone to getting dental issues, which means more inbound calls to dental offices for appointments, inquiries, and emergencies. However, such a flood of call after call is challenging for front desk staff to manage, leading to missed opportunities and longer waiting periods for patients.
